scripts.precompile: if not exist dist mkdir dist
scripts.backup: powershell -Command "$v=(Get-Content addons/sourcemod/scripting/soccer_mod.sp | Select-String 'PLUGIN_VERSION \"([^\"]+)\"').Matches.Groups[1].Value; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path \"addons/sourcemod/plugins/old/$v\"; Copy-Item addons/sourcemod/plugins/soccer_mod.smx \"addons/sourcemod/plugins/old/$v/\""
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run deploy
scripts.release: npm run backup && npm run build
